testcase.name: downloadTransaction
testcase.system-out: Click on Report Module Click on download Sub Module Verify user is on the Download page user select status like Error click on Select Bank click on the Select Bank Enter Merchnat bank name in a Search Bank name text field select Merchant Bank from all Merchant bank Select MID from MID dropdown Click on the Date range select date range :- Yesterday Select Time Zone :- Asia/Hong_Kong user select values Bank Transactions Click on Download Button
